title: Ep 2148 - Jethalal Invites Neighbours To Tapus Birthday Party
shortDesc: Jethalal and Daya plan to celebrate Tapu’s birthday. Jethalal informs Tapu’s friends that he is going to arrange Tapu’s birthday party in the evening. He invites all to the birthday party.

title: Ep 2149 - Jethalal Plans To Gift Laptop To Tapu
shortDesc: Bagha, Natwarlal and Bawari get ready to celebrate Tapu’s birthday in Jethalal’s shop. Bawri advises Jethalal to gift a laptop to Tapu on his birthday.

title: Ep 2150 - Tapu Plans To Throw A Party To His Friends
shortDesc: Abdul informs Daya and her neighbours that Tapu is going to arrange a party on the occasion of his birthday. Atmaram Bhide gets shocked to see a caterer agency preparing for Tapu’s birthday in Gokuldham society.

title: Ep 2151 - Tapus friends Gear Up For His Birthday Party
shortDesc: Tapu's friends inform their parents that Tapu will come to Gokuldham society in the evening. Jethalal's neighbours get ready for his birthday party.

title: Ep 2152 - Tapus Friends Gather For His Birthday Party
shortDesc: Tapu’s friends and family members gather for his birthday party. However, Tapu doesn’t turn up for the event. Jethalal decides to cancel Tapu’s birthday party.

title: Ep 2153 - Tapu Meets Raju
shortDesc: Tapu’s friends ask him the reason for coming late to his birthday party. Tapu tells his friends and neighbours that he has decided to celebrate his birthday along with his new friend Raju.

title: Ep 2154 - Sundar Wishes Tapu On His Birthday
shortDesc:
Raju thanks Tapu’s friends for organizing his birthday party. Sundar comes to Jethalal’s house and wishes Tapu for his birthday.

title: Ep 2155 - Tapu Sena Plan To Celebrate Holi
shortDesc: Tapu and his friends inform Abdul that they are going to celebrate Holi in Gokuldham society. Madhavi excitedly applies colors on Atmaram’s face.

title: Ep 2156 - Atmaram And Madhavi Play Holi
shortDesc: Tapu and his friends come to Bhide’s house. They notice that Atmaram and Madhavi are playing holi in the house. Bagha and Natwarlal offer ‘thandai’ to their customers on the occasion of Holi.

title: Ep 2157 - Atmaram And Friends Light Holika Bonfire
shortDesc:
Jethalal invites Bagha and Natwarlal to Gokuldham society to play holi. In the evening, Atmaram Bhide and his neighbours light Holika bonfire in Gokuldham society.

title: Ep 2158 - Babita and Iyer Agree To Play Holi
shortDesc: Babita and Iyer’s neighbours convince them to play holi in Gokuldham society. Popatlal learns that a marriage bureau is going to introduce him to a girl in a couple of days.

title: Ep 2159 - Popatlal Decides To Not Play Holi
shortDesc: Popatlal decides to not play with color on the day of Holi. Jethalal and his neighbours gather to celebrate Holi. Taarak and his friends learn that Popatlal has not turned up for the celebration.

title: Ep 2160 - Popatlal Locks Himself In His House
shortDesc:
Iyer and Atmaram come to Popatlal’s house. Iyer informs his neighbours that Popatlal has locked himself in his house.
Watch all the latest videos of Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah online on SonyLiv official website SonyLiv.com

title: Ep 2161 - Popatlal Refuses To Play Holi
shortDesc: Popatlal clears it to his neighbours that he will not play ‘holi’ with them. Tapu tells his neighbours that he has found a way to bring Popatlal out of his house.

title: Ep 2162 - Tapus Secret Plan
shortDesc: Tapu finds out a way to bring Popatlal out of his house to play holi. He asks Sundar to go to Popatlal’s house in the guise of a girl.
